Reviews.Title: Worth Every Penny!
Reviews.Author: Alicia Schuette "Alicat"
Reviews.Content: I'm extremely pleased with how quickly this product came, how professionally wrapped it was, and how everything that was listed; actually came with the product! I just got it in the mail, and couldn't be more happy!! Would recommend this kit to anyone; totally worth every dollar spent. Thank you SOO MUCH!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Michelle Ravell
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera.  I love light weight.  The package is amazing.  Definitely worth the money. Exactly as described.

Reviews.Title: Cameta Camera Cannon SL1 Package
Reviews.Author: daniel iknaian
Reviews.Content: Hello EveryoneI just recently received my Cannon SL1 package from Cameta and everything is great and in working order.  The camera is light and small so it makes working with it in smaller spaces easy.The flash is greatMacro and telephoto lenses screw right into the 18-55 lens and are a great addition.camera remote, cleaning kit, shoulder bag and flash card (class 10(best)) & USB reader is handy.Tripod is ok, there are better out there for sure but for the price its a steal!Thanks Cameta you've got a customer for life!

ProductInfo.Features:
CAMETA CAMERA KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens + <2> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x UHS-1 Class 10 Memory Card + <3> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash +
<4> Spare LP-E12 Battery for Canon + <5> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Protector Filter + <6> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control +
<7> Precision Design 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Auxiliary Lens + <8> Precision Design 1000 Digital SLR Gadget Bag with Shoulder Strap + <9> Precision Design Full-Size 58" Tripod with Case + <10> Precision Design Mini-HDMI to HDMI Cable for HDTV connection +
<11> Precision Design SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> Precision Design 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> Precision Design Memory Card Wallet + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens with 32GB Card + Battery + Case + Flash + Tele/Wide Lenses + Tripod + Accessory Kit
